com.direwolfdigital.cake.data.achievemen: Do 3,000 damage to opposing Pokémon with your {G} Pokémon.
com.direwolfdigital.cake.rules.abilities: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
This Pokémon can't use Ninja Blade during your next turn.
